alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:53PM CDT until July 29 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Southern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arkadelphia, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Caddo Valley... Sparkman... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Curtis... Manning... Ouachita... Joan... Willow... Dalark... Griffithtown... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 64 and 78. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
